pullRequest.title: updated the readme with new links
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description (required)
Fixes: #3768
The readme previously had broken links which didn't exactly lead to the page we wanted. I have fixed and added links according to the respective anchors as suggested by @sivaraam.
Thank you @sivaraam for solving that doubt :).
@misaochan @sivaraam Please review.

nodes.bodyText: These links were indented on purpose. They rightly belong to the respective sections. So, kindly revert these indentation changes.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,9 +17,9 @@ We try to have an extensive documentation at [our wiki here at Github][4]:
 
 * [User Documentation][5]
 * [Contributor Documentation][6]
-  * [Volunteers Welcome!][7]
+* [Volunteers Welcome!][7]
 * [Developer Documentation][8]
-  * [Libraries Used][9]
+* [Libraries Used][9]

nodes.bodyText: A possible improvement would be to suffix this with #-android-documentation so that it leads directly to the content. This would mean the link would be: https://github.com/commons-app/commons-app-documentation/blob/master/android/README.md#-android-documentation

 [3]: https://github.com/commons-app/apps-android-commons/issues

+[4]: https://github.com/commons-app/commons-app-documentation/blob/master/android/README.md

nodes.bodyText: Another possible link that could be suffixed. Link: https://github.com/commons-app/commons-app-documentation/blob/master/android/Libraries-used.md#libraries-used
